From interactive sessions to networking to collaborations,3 odd hours went in a blink. Entrepreneurs made new freinds,new partners,some even got new investors. It was a win win for everyone.

full_text: For new investors: Been through these kinda destruction thrice,lost money and made more ,lost money and made more,lost money and again made more. But I always was there and loved the journey. Never left market for even a day. So if you really want to make it big here,just stay put..Endure the brutality. This too will pass. Don't hope against hope on kachra companies. Sell them,learn from your mistakes. 80% of stocks with narratives will probably never recover or may take a very long time just like it's been always. But good companies with good governance a d growth will recover for sure. Good luck people..Have a happy investing career ahead..
name: Arun Mukherjee
